mapper.insert: insert into address (AddId, UserId, AddName, Address, DetailAddress, AddPhone, AddCreateTime, AddMark) values (#{addid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{addname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detailaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addcreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{addmark,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update address set UserId = #{userid,jdbcType=CHAR}, AddName = #{addname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DetailAddress = #{detailaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AddPhone = #{addphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AddCreateTime = #{addcreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, AddMark = #{addmark,jdbcType=INTEGER} where AddId = #{addid,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select AddId, UserId, AddName, Address, DetailAddress, AddPhone, AddCreateTime, AddMark from address
